getIntegerFormat

public static java.text.NumberFormat getIntegerFormat()

Returns:
Standard format for integer values.

getNewLineConstraint

public static java.awt.GridBagConstraints getNewLineConstraint()
Returns a constraint which can be e.g. used in a GridBagLayout. An element added with this constraint will fill its current line.

Returns:
Standard constraint for GridBagLayout elements.

getBottomContstraint

public static java.awt.GridBagConstraints getBottomContstraint()
Returns a constraint which can be e.g. used in a GridBagLayout. An element added with this constraint will fill the entire rest of the layout.

Returns:
Standard constraint for GridBagLayout elements.

addGridBagElement

public static void addGridBagElement(java.awt.Component component,
                                     java.awt.GridBagLayout layout,
                                     java.awt.GridBagConstraints constr,
                                     java.awt.Container parent)
Adds the given component to the container using the given layout and constraints.

Parameters:
component - the component to add.
layout - the respective layout of the container.
constr - the constraints with which the component should be added.
parent - the container to which the element should be added.
